discussion.heading: Discussion
discussion.first_sentence: Clinical Remarks Based on Results from Animal and Human Biopsy Studies The knowledge obtained from animal studies highlights the pivotal importance of local therapy and implant decontamination in treating peri-implantitis lesions.
discussion.first_100_chars: Clinical Remarks Based on Results from Animal and Human Biopsy Studies The knowledge obtained from a
discussion.last_sentence: Therefore, these contextual differences must be considered when drawing conclusions from the study findings since only two of the studies in this review decontaminated the implants in the mouth before explantation and subsequent analysis of residual
discussion.last_100_chars: fore explantation and subsequent analysis of residual bacteria/biofilm and surface alterations.69,71

conclusions.heading: Conclusions
conclusions.first_sentence: • Decontamination of the implant surface is necessary to resolve a peri-implantitis lesion.
conclusions.first_100_chars: • Decontamination of the implant surface is necessary to resolve a peri-implantitis lesion. • Implan
conclusions.last_sentence: In this context, electrolytic cleaning, APA, and Er:YAG laser therapy emerged as methods that best embody the attributes of effectiveness.
conclusions.last_100_chars: , APA, and Er:YAG laser therapy emerged as methods that best embody the attributes of effectiveness.
